summary: An adaptation of the classic Dickens tale, where an orphan meets a pickpocket on the streets of London. From there, he joins a household of boys who are trained to steal for their master.
cast: Barney Clark|Jeremy Swift|Ian McNeice|Richard Durden|Timothy Bateson|Andy de la Tour|Filip Hes|Andreas Papadopoulos|Laurie Athey|Joseph Tremain|Peter Copley|Andy Linden|John Nettleton|Tony Noble|Michael Heath|Gillian Hanna|Teresa Churcher|Chris Overton|Gerard Horan|Morgane Polanski|Liz Smith|Harry Eden|Levi Hayes|Ben Kingsley|Lewis Chase|Leanne Rowe|Ophelia Lovibond|Elvis Polanski|Edward Hardwicke|Patrick Godfrey|Anezka Novak|Andy Camm|Alun Armstrong|Frank Mills|Jamie Foreman|Turbo|David Meeking|Frances Cuka|Paul Brooke|Andrea Miltner|Kaeren Revell|Kay Raven|Mark Strong|Jake Curran|Lizzy Le Quesne|Robert Orr|Paul Eden|Nick Stringer|James Babson|Richard Ridings

title: Oliver Twist
